concept.title: Configuring the Gallery View
concept.shortdesc: The gallery view is a Share Extensibility module which can be configured via the Module Deployment Status page.

conbody.p: The gallery view is auto-deployed by default.

To change the deployment configuration navigate to the Module Deployment Status page: share/page/modules/deploy and modify the settings for the Alfresco :: Media Management - Document List Gallery View module.
